articles.title: About this site
articles.description: This website is the first step in developing a Community of Practice around evidence synthesis for Biodiversity and Climate in Norway
articles.contents:
Membership of the Community of Practice
If you (an individual or an organisation) would like to join this Community of Practice please contact us. Any evidence producers or evidence users are more than welcome to join the Community.
You can contact Dr Matthew Grainger at NINA for more details and an informal discussion.
Status of the Community of Practice
We are currently applying for funds to consolidate the Community of Practice

articles.title: Community of Practice (CoP) for Biodiversity & Climate Evidence Synthesis in Norway
articles.description: Here is the beginning of a Community of Practice focused on ensuring that robust methods for synthesising evidence are used, and new methods, tools and frameworks are developed, to provide the best possible evidence to policy makers.
